room_title: Escape room "Black Site" by Make a Break Escape in Tampa
review: Black Site was my fourth escape room in the bay area, first at Make a Break, and I loved it. The game master was awesome and we made it out (through a lot of rewarding effort) with two minutes to spare. It was an awesome challenge. Can't wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "Black Site" by Make a Break Escape in Tampa
review: First time doing and escape room and we loved it! So much that we booked another one for the same night! Black Site was the best!!

room_title: Escape room "Black Site" by Make a Break Escape in Tampa
review: Our group of six had our first escape room experience playing Black Site and it was so much fun! The difficulty was just right for us. Would definitely go back and try even harder next time!
